column5: This is an apartment under our house on stilts. Private entry through the carport and a private deck. One room with a private bath/shower. Nautical themed. DVD player and small screen provided. Full sized refrigerator under carport available to guests. Wifi. Full size bed, new memory foam mattress, bed frame and bunk beds. Microwave Oven
column8: Garage Apartment on the Bolivar Peninsula.
